Name: Stela
Description: A round-topped stela made from limestone, around the edge of which is a border of painted squares. At the top are three lines of text, painted in red, the last line is worn and damaged. In the lower half is a scene depicting two men, each seated on a low backed chair, opposite each other with a laden offering table between them. Each figure wears a white kilt and close-fitting cap, their bodies are painted red.
